item.title: The CIER Employment Index indicates a decrease in employment rates in China
item.description:
The Chinese job platform Zhaopin and the China Institute for Employment Research (CIER) at Renmin University have published their CIER Employment Index Report for July to September 2015. The report’s index, which measures the ease of finding a job, rose consistently from 2011 to 2014.
